lyrics.text: Lesson 1. A private conversation. First listen and then answer the question.
lyrics.translation: 第一课。私人谈话。首先听，然后回答问题。

lyrics.text: Why did the writer complain to the people behind him?
lyrics.translation: 为什么作家要向他后面的人抱怨？

lyrics.text: Last week I went to the theatre. I had a very good seat. The play was very interesting.
lyrics.translation: 上周我去了剧院。我有一个非常好的座位。这出戏非常有趣。

lyrics.text: I did not enjoy it. A young man and a young woman were sitting behind me. They were talking
lyrics.translation: 我并不喜欢。一个年轻男子和一个年轻女子坐在我后面。他们在交谈。

lyrics.text: loudly. I got very angry. I could not hear the actors. I turned round. I looked at the
lyrics.translation: 人。我非常生气。我听不见演员的声音。我转过身。我看着那些

lyrics.text: man and the woman angrily. They did not pay any attention. In the end I could not bear it.
lyrics.translation: 男人和女人生气地交谈。他们没有注意到任何东西。最后我无法忍受了。

lyrics.text: I turned round again. I can't hear a word, I said angrily. It's none of your business,
lyrics.translation: 我再次转过身。我一个字也听不见，我生气地说。这不关你的事，

lyrics.text: the young man said rudely. This is a private conversation.
lyrics.translation: 年轻人粗鲁地说。这是私人谈话。
